benchmark_details.name: BizFinBench (Business-Driven Real-World Financial Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: BizFinBench is the first benchmark specifically designed to evaluate large language models (LLMs) in real-world financial applications, consisting of 6,781 well-annotated queries grouped into nine fine-grained categories across five dimensions: numerical calculation, reasoning, information extraction, prediction recognition, and knowledge-based question answering.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating LLMs through a business-driven methodology across various financial tasks.

data.source: Real user queries from iwencai APP and additional context data from internal and external financial sources.
data.annotation: Annotated by three senior financial experts to ensure accuracy and relevance.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are computed based on expert-validated answers compared to model outputs.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment with correct answers and reasoning quality.
methodology.validation: Performance validated against multiple LLMs in diverse financial contexts.
